Study Title: Study to Assess the Potential for Adrenal Suppression Following Treatment With DSXS in Patients With Atopic Dermatitis
Brief Summary: this study is to evaluate the potential of DSXS to suppress HPA axis function in patients with moderate to severe atopic dermatitis.
Primary Outcome Measures: Number of Participants With HPA Axis Suppression, Hypothalamic Pituitary Adrenal (HPA) Axis Response to Cosyntropin demonstrating the absence or presence of adrenal suppression at the end of treatment. HPA Axis suppression is defined as a 30 minute post CortrosynTM injection level cortisol level of â‰¤ 18 mcg/100ml., 28 days.
Study Design: Allocation: NA|Intervention Model: SINGLE_GROUP|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
